question: Which VKORC1 genotypes are associated with a need for lower warfarin maintenance dose?
ideal_answer: Patients with VKORC1-1639GA or AA required a lower warfarin maintenance dose.

snippets.text: Patients with VKORC1-1639GA or AA required a lower warfarin maintenance dose compared with patients with VKORC1-1639GG (SMD = -0.666, 95% CI: -0.887 to -0.445, I2 = 33%).
